title: narasimhAgaccha
sahitya:
narasimhAgaccha parabrahma puccha svEccha svaccha


anupallavi

 harihara brahmEndrAdi pUjitAtyaccha parama bhAgavata prahlAda bhaktyaccha


caraNam   dhIratara ghaTikAcalEshvara sauratara hEma kOTishvara vIra vara mOhana vibhAsvara 
mAra vara mAnava harIshvara murahara nagadhara sarasijakara paramapuruSa 
pavanaja shubhakara surucira kari girivarada vicara sarasa guruguha hrdaya sahacara
